org.researchstack.backbone

Class ResourcePathManager.Resource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.researchstack.backbone.ResourcePathManager.Resource
  • Enclosing class:
    ResourcePathManager

    public static class ResourcePathManager.Resource
extends java.lang.Object
    Class represents one asset within the assets folder.
